Emi Ride Rent a Car Dubai - Privacy Policy

PRIVACY POLICY

We ask you to read the terms of use carefully before using the E M I RIDE RENT A CAR website.

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR maintains this website and all the information contained in its website such as photos, texts, videos, music, software and other graphic materials for the use of its clients, employees and the general public, only and exclusively for the legal purposes mentioned below.

Acceptance of Terms: Jurisdiction

From the moment you enter and/or browse our website, you accept the terms and conditions in this document in order to comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including Federal Law No. 40 of 1992. of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) on the Protection of Intellectual Works and Copyright and its Development Regulations. Likewise, you declare to accept these Website Terms of Use on your behalf or on behalf of any party you are representing. Use of the Website is unauthorized in any jurisdiction that does not give effect to these Terms of Use for our website. If you choose not to agree to these terms, please do not use this website.

This Site is wholly controlled and operated by E M I RIDE RENT A CAR from its main office located in the United Arab Emirates. By accessing this Website, you accept the laws, rules and regulations existing in the United Arab Emirates and especially the Emirate of Dubai and will apply to all matters related to the use of our website, likewise you agree that any legal issue will be subject solely and exclusively to the exclusive jurisdiction of Dubai, United Arab Emirates. All persons who access the Site from other countries around the world do so at their own risk and are solely responsible for complying with the applicability of local regulations and/or laws. E M I RIDE RENT A CAR does not guarantee that the Content of the Site is appropriate or available for use in other countries of the world and access from territories where the Content is or could be declared illegal is prohibited. You acknowledge and agree that E M I RIDE RENT A CAR reserves the right to refuse or terminate your access to our website at any time and without prior notice.

Copyright and Restrictions on the Use of Exclusive Content

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR provides all the information on its website to the general public, as well as we retain the copyright of all texts and graphic images. You agree, having been informed by E M I RIDE RENT A CAR through this privacy policy document, that the Content is protected in the United Arab Emirates and internationally by a variety of laws, such as copyright laws, provisions of treaties, trademark laws, and other proprietary rights laws. In addition to the Rights of E M I RIDE RENT A CAR in the use of individual elements of its Content. E M I RIDE RENT A CAR or its allies own all copyrights in the coordination, arrangement and selection of its Content.

Through this document permission is granted to access the Content of our Website in whole or in part, to yourself as well as to print a single copy of this information solely and exclusively for your personal use, but this will only apply at the moment who wishes to view and/or navigate through our Website or make a reservation or services offered by our Website. Likewise, permission to store files on your computer solely and exclusively for your personal use is also authorized. However, this authorization ends automatically if any of the terms of use of the website are breached. Any other use of our Website Content, including modification, publication, transmission, participation in the transfer of sale, reproduction, creation of derivative works of distribution, performance, display, incorporation into another website, duplication (whether by linking or any other method), or by any other means thus taking advantage of any of its contents in whole or in part, nor downloading and/or repeated use of our software for uses other than those permitted without the prior, express and written authorization of E M I RIDE RENT A CAR.

Content Scope Limitation

Our website contains information about E M I RIDE RENT A CAR and its promotional campaigns and content. The services and products described on this Site contain exclusive features and specifications within the United Arab Emirates and are offered for sale-rental within the Site. Promotional campaigns, if any described on this site, are available only for the United Arab Emirates or those Emirates specifically referred to in the description of its content. The pricing information contained on our Website is for informational purposes only and does not constitute an offer to sell its products and services and may not be actual at the time of consultation through our website. The actual prices and the terms and conditions of sale will be determined at the time of making the reservation or-and through their official communication channels and/or their line dedicated to reservations and information.

Sending and Collecting Information

open cases in which E M I RIDE RENT A CAR may request personal identification information from users who browse our website in order to provide them with a service or information related to (promotions or information sent by mail, WhatsApp or their social networks). This information, such as name, residence address, email address, additional information, is collected and stored in a manner appropriate to the nature of the data by E M I RIDE RENT A CAR and is used to comply with the request required by you. E M I RIDE RENT A CAR makes every effort to ensure the secure collection and transmission of its customers’ confidential information using industry-accepted data collection and encryption methodologies, E M I RIDE RENT A CAR does not guarantee the security of information transmitted to or from the Site or data collected. The information you provide and the data collected are used by E M I RIDE RENT A CAR in order to improve its customer service. By accepting these terms, you grant E M I RIDE RENT A CAR irrevocable, royalty-free and unrestricted permission to use, reproduce, display, perform, modify, transmit and distribute any information you submit.

Prohibited Conduct

You are prohibited from posting or transmitting to or from our website any unlawful, political, threatening, libelous, defamatory, obscene, scandalous, inflammatory, pornographic, profane, or any other material that may give rise to any civil or criminal liability under international laws or those governing within the United Arab Emirates. You also agree to (1) not use the Site to upload or distribute in any way files that contain viruses, corrupted files, malicious files, or any other similar software or programs that may damage and/or affect the operation of another person’s computer or device. that you use our website. (2) not to tap into, interfere with, or disrupt our website or any network connected to our website. (3) not to use any device, software in order to interfere with the proper working of our website or any service or transaction that is carried out through our website. (4) not to use our website to collect or export personal information, financial information about other people who interact with or browse our website. (5) not to use the services, products associated with our website for illegal purposes. (6) comply with all the regulations, policies and procedures for the networks that are connected to the official site of E M I RIDE RENT A CAR.

Warranty Disclaimer

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR does not guarantee the use, validity, accuracy or reliability of results of use in any other way respecting the content of our website or any other website that is linked to E M I RIDE RENT A CAR to or from our site Web. The content of our website is provided without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. E M I RIDE RENT A CAR disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including those of merchantability, for and for a particular purpose or other violation of rights that may be presented to third parties.

Reviews

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR may revise, modify or withdraw the content of its website in whole or in part at any time without prior notice and will govern the information and / or content that is currently published. E M I RIDE RENT A CAR may at any time revise and/or modify these terms of use of our website by updating this posting. You agree to be bound by any such revisions and changes and agree that by visiting our website you will be subject to our website Terms in effect at the time you access our website.

Limitation of Liability

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR will not be responsible for any damages such as incidental or consequential damages that arise or are related to the use or the inability to use our Website, the Content or the links that at the time of the consultation are damaged due to Viruses that affect the operation of your computer or mobile device due to the use of the products or services advertised with our website.

Cookies

The “cookies” are pieces of information that E M I RIDE RENT A CAR transfers to the computer equipment or mobile devices of the users for maintenance purposes, statistical records. E M I RIDE RENT A CAR may place Cookies to users who visit from advertisements, hyperlinks on other websites to track the success of an advertising campaign or marketing program developed by E M I RIDE RENT A CAR likewise may place Cookies to provide access agile to our website.

Use

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR uses Personal Information to facilitate the processing of reservations, develop improvements on our website, for purposes related to marketing and advertising campaigns with topics such as: promotions, reservations and/or purchase E M I RIDE RENT A CAR products in order to evaluate the use of our website by analyzing usage data.

Our website may contain or suggest to its clients the completion of additional surveys or questionnaires that request information, comments and suggestions. E M I RIDDE RENT A CAR uses the information you provide us to help us design better services or promotions, in order to personalize the booking experience through our website.

The personal information we collect is used by us to target marketing and advertising strategies. This type of advertising may be done through images, videos, as well as promotional emails sent by E M I RIDE RENT A CAR or by third parties under contract with E M I RIDE RENT A CAR from their official emails or our website.

Finally, E M I RIDE RENT A CAR investigates the demographics, interests and behavior of users based on the information you provide us when making the payment for your reservation. We do this for better understand and measure the use of our website as well as to improve the content and services we offer to our customers.

Sharing Personal Information

Except as indicated in this Policy or on our Websites, E M I RIDE RENT A CAR never provides Personal Information to third parties without the User’s consent unless required by court order from any or all government, police or of any judicial entity of the United Arab Emirates.

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR may also share personal information with third party business partners so that they can provide services to E M I RIDE RENT A CAR that are consistent with the terms of this Policy on our website.

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR may also disclose Personal Information in special cases where we have reason to believe that disclosing this information is necessary to identify, contact or bring legal action against someone who may be violating the Website Terms of Use or who may be violating E M I RIDE RENT A CAR or the rights of others or cause damage or interference to E M I RIDE RENT A CAR.

Security

E M I RIDE RENT A CAR only collects Personal Information from our customers to the extent deemed necessary to fulfill its business purposes and uses appropriate security technology to ensure the security, integrity, and privacy of all information. However, E M I RIDE RENT A CAR is not responsible for any violation of your security or for the actions of third parties that may obtain any Personal Information.
